raw_mentions: In some instances, the affinity of the target antibody towards the antigen on cancer cell surface could be as high as 10<sup>−9</sup>˜10<sup>−12 </sup>(Kd, mole/liter).

In some embodiments, the ligands of the present application bind to cell surface receptors with an affinity of 10<sup>−6</sup>˜10<sup>−9 </sup>(Kd value).
In some embodiments, the ligands bind to cell surface receptors with an affinity of at least 10<sup>−7</sup>, at least 10<sup>−8</sup>, at least 10<sup>−9 </sup>M (Kd value).
